resources.string: This is an App created by John Sartain | Sartain Studio | John\'s Android Studio Tutorials to provide a code reference and make it easier for new developers to learn quickly by learning from example.

Please reuse code in your project if you desire. You don\'t need to give attribution but if you can that would be appreciated. All I ask is that you don\'t sell this domestically and/or commercially for a profit or other form of gain.
• New Layout \n• New Design \n• New features
